when i type in the co ordiantes for lumbridge chef such as spawn = 847 3211 3215 (spaced out like above) when ever i try to log back in to see if it has worked my screen is black and i cant get on and wen i delete cords it lets me back on can any1 explain?

item.title: How do i do autospawn
item.dc:creator: @sam_co sam co
item.description:
@sam_co wrote:

lol nvm i found out ages ago ty anyways spawned loads of stuf o.o

Read full topic

item.title: How do i do autospawn
item.dc:creator: @Robban1 Robban1
item.description:
@Robban1 wrote:

Like, copy this: spawn = 81 3262 3283 0 3264 3285 3260 3281 2 Lumbridge Cow

And change the “81” to the id for the npc as you want like 1(man), spawn = 1 3262 3283 0 0 0 0 0 2 Lumbridge Cow
And then the coords, change it, 3262 and 3283 is the cords, spawn = 1 1555 1555 0 0 0 0 0 2 MAN

THATS IT! srry if i didnt type it in code thing but easier to explain without.

Read full topic

idk what tab meens and i tryed all of thoose codes on my auto spawner non worked also, the only way i can get back onto the game without it being a black screen was to delete it

Read full topic

item.title: How do i do autospawn
item.dc:creator: @123is456 123is456
item.description:
@123is456 wrote:

sam co:

didant work

You have to use TAB.
so instead of…

spawn = 847	3211	  32150	0	0	0 	0	1

it should be…

spawn = 847	3211	3215	0	0	0	0 	0	1

and the zeros in between make the npc walk.
so the first zero…

spawn = 847	3211	32150	->0	0	0 	0	1

is how far over to the right you want your npc to go.
(Make sure your facing the north while doing this)
the second zero,

spawn = 847	3211	3215	0	->0	0	0 	0	1

tells the server how far to the upper Right the npc will walk
the third and fourth zeros are the same as the first two, but you have to go to the left instead of the right, and the bottom left instead of the top right.
so remember to face the north as you add thre npc walk, and use to TAB button whenever you are adding npcs to autospawn.cfg

heres an example.

spawn = 847	3211	3215	0	3215	3219	3207 	3211	1

that will make the npc walk 4 squares in every direction

Read full topic

item.title: How do i do autospawn
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

Try

spawn = 847	3211	   32150	 0	 0	 0 	0	 1

this will spawn the npc and make him stand in one spot

Read full topic
